title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat the eggs and mix with the cheese.
Toss the spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat.
Stir in the egg mixture and serve immediately with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and grill until cooked.
Prepare the tomato gravy with spices and cream.
Add grilled chicken to the gravy and simmer.
Serve hot with naan or rice.
